channel.title: Harker Development Team on Harker Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Harker Development Team on Harker Dev

item.title: Bell Schedule
item.description: One of our founding projects A bell schedule application students to check the schedule. Can be found on the web at tiny.cc/hsbell, or the Apple App Store at tiny.cc/hsbell-ios.

item.title: Course Planner
item.description: Looking to our future Course planning software for students to lay out their classes for their high school career.

item.title: GPA Calculator
item.description: Warning: can be addictive An application for students to calculate their GPA. Can be found on the web at http://tiny.cc/gpa.

item.title: Harker Lunch
item.description: We know you can’t wait for lunch An application for students to check what’s for lunch. Can be found on the web at tiny.cc/lunchmenu, or the Apple App Store at tiny.cc/lunchmenu-ios.

item.title: Harker Pay
item.description: An proprietary platform to support school transactions Payment software that allows students to make purchases around campus.

item.title: Join Harker Dev
item.description: Our team is looking to grow. Ready for a challenge? Our team loves to tackle problems head on and we love working late nights to create amazing applications. We work with large amounts of code and important projects, so make sure you have the time to be able to commit (ha - get it). No experience? No problem. We all start somewhere â€” we love to help mentor students who are passionate about learning and exploring what computer science can offer for their community.
